blog.name: trishasaddictions
blog.title: Blog of a Fangirl
blog.description: 22. Bookworm. TV lover. Movie buff. Music fan. Video Game player. Shipper of many ships.

body:
Starks endgame and direwolves

I have been thinking about this a lot and how I see and want to see it ending. There have been a lot of speculation on how and if the direwolves play a role. And my kind of recent theory doesn’t involve who lives or dies, but who remains a Stark at the very end. Talking about the show, not books. Sansa and Bran no longer have their wolves while Jon does and Arya’s is still alive. So what if it’s foreshadowing? Bran is 3 eye raven now and you could debate not really a Stark anymore. Could that mean Sansa marries someone in the final season? Someone who isn’t a Stark? Maybe Arya goes off to explore and live the life she wants to live, but remains close to her pack? That would leave Jon. Maybe he remains a Stark in the North, possibly not in name but that would be great too. He’s always been a Stark to me and I feel like that is still part of how he identifies.

I could be reaching, but it’s just something that came into my head a couple of nights ago

tags: why you do this to me grrm??
and why haven’t you given me the reunion i deserve???
a song of ice and fire
summary: i swear, my heart always breaks when i think about the fact that, growing up, Jon always wanted to know what his mother looked...
body:
i swear, my heart always breaks when i think about the fact that, growing up, Jon always wanted to know what his mother looked like, how she was like, and whether or not she loved him

and growing up, he had Arya, who we are shown has a striking resemblance to Lyanna, shares a lot of her character traits, and loves Jon just as fiercely as Lyanna did

blog.name: queenofpanache
blog.title: ICE QUEEN
blog.description: Everything before the word 'but' is horse shit. - Jon Snow

body:
MOCKINGBIRD

Arya: You’re doing it wrong. You need to burn away that horrible bit there. Otherwise it’s get infected & fester…. I know you don’t like fire, but if you don’t do it right -

The Hound: No fire.

Arya: It’ll only take a second. It won’t hurt that much..

The Hound: No fire!

The Hound: Shut up about it.. About everything. Thanks to you, I’m a walking bag if silver anywhere the Lannisters hold sway… Which is everywhere between where we are now & where we’re going. I’m as stupid as that hog you stuck back in the village, getting myself cut, and stabbed and bitten. No reward is worth this much trouble.

The Hound: Wish I’d never laid eyes on you. You said your brother gave you that sword. My brother gave me this! It was like what you said a while back - pressed me to the fire like I was a nice juicy mutton chop.

Arya: Why?

The Hound: Thought I stole one of his toys. I didn’t steal it. I was just playing with it… The pain was bad, the smell was worse. But the worst thing was that it was my brother who did it. My father, who protected him, told everyone my bedding caught fire…

The Hound: You think you’re on your own?

Arya: Let me wash it out & help you sew it up at least..

But the worst thing was that it was my brother who did it. My father, who protected him, told everyone my bedding caught fire…

I guess Tyrion was in an almost similar situation. Cersei tried to have him executed while Tywin didn’t seem to invest any effort to protect Tyrion in accordance to Joffrey’s assassination.

summary: Meryn Trant : That's right. I killed your master. And now I'm gonna kill you too, with your own sword, no less, which in the...
body:
Meryn Trant : That's right. I killed your master. And now I'm gonna kill you too, with your own sword, no less, which in the very immediate future, will become... my sword.
Arya Stark : Bitch, you don't have a future.

tags: finally a girl is no one
title: No One
body:
Arya Stark : You sent her to kill me ! I thought you were my friend.
Jaqen H'ghar : Yes, but finally a girl is no one. As regards our friendship...
Arya Stark :  Clearly there is none !
Jaqen H'ghar : I accepted the task of training you because I admired you and I came through the experience admiring you even more.
Arya Stark : Oh. 
Arya Stark : I'm still going home.
Jaqen H'ghar : You'll be back.
Arya Stark : No.
Jaqen H'ghar : *kisses her hair softly* Yes.
Arya Stark : Maybe.

dialogue.label: Arya Stark :
dialogue.phrase: You sent her to kill me ! I thought you were my friend.

tags: what is Arya now up to?
this took longer than I hoped
summary: Wolf Dreams The next chapter in my time-travel AU “This Time, We’ll Do Better” is up. Arya and wolves - who would have guessed?...
caption:
Wolf Dreams

The next chapter in my time-travel AU “This Time, We’ll Do Better” is up. Arya and wolves - who would have guessed? :-)

The first time it happened, Arya woke up with her heart pumping, skin covered in cold sweat. It took her a while to realise that it had been just a dream, and that in truth she was lying next to Gendry just as she was every night, so real had it felt. The dream both terrified and thrilled her, especially the eerie sensation of being one with the wolf.

blog.name: thegeekembassy
blog.title: The Geek Embassy
blog.description:
The ambassadors of Geek Embassy endeavor to share all types of geeky passions with our community. As a group, we write individually but we come together to share our collective experiences with different media. For TGE Watches, we talk about movies and TV shows. TGE Plays, we play games together. For TGE Reads, we select a book, read it, and then discuss it together. We are hoping through our collective knowledge and know-how to share these geeky interests with our readers, viewers, and listeners. 

Listen to our podcast at https://www.thegeekembassy.com/category/podcast

tags: Game of Thrones Reunions We Can&039;t Wait For
summary: Game of Thrones Reunions We Can't Wait For: Arya and Melisandre
title: Game of Thrones Reunions We Can't Wait For: Arya and Melisandre
body:
Game of Thrones Reunions We Can’t Wait For: Arya and Melisandre

Many of the exciting reunions we can expect in the final season of Game of Thrones are from characters who have a lot of history between them. But there are two characters who interacted for less than a minute, and their reunion has the potential to be one of the most interesting. Those two characters are Arya and Melisandre.

The Meeting

Arya and Melisandre meet when the latter comes to take…
